title: Payments made for two LP gas shipments
body_lines: The Litro Gas company says that a payment of USD 6.5 million has been made for two shipments of liquefied petroleum (LP) gas.

Litro chairman Vijitha Herath stated that the payment has been made for a total of 7,500 metric tonnes of LP gas and that out of this the first shipment of 3,500 metric tonnes is scheduled to arrive in Colombo on Thursday (26).
